Package com.CZ2002.project_commands.reservations

Class UpdateReservationCommand

java.lang.Object
com.CZ2002.project_commands.reservations.UpdateReservationCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand<MenuView,InvalidReservationException>, IGregorianCalendarFormatter
public class UpdateReservationCommand extends Object implements ICommand<MenuView,InvalidReservationException>, IGregorianCalendarFormatter
This class implements ICommand to complete the 'update reservation' action.

There are several ways to update a Reservation instance:

  • Name
  • Contact
  • Pax
  • Table Number
  • Reservation Period
This class handles each one seperately and so must accept input to decide which field to update.

      public UpdateReservationCommand(ReservationManager reservationManager, TableManager tableManager, Reservation reservation, Scanner sc)
      Constructor that accepts the necessary parameters for execute to successfully complete.
      Parameters:
      reservationManager - the reference to the Restaurant's ReservationManager
      tableManager - the reference to the Restaurant's TableManager
      reservation - the reference to the specific Reservation instance to be updated
      sc - the Scanner used by the boundary layer

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public MenuView execute() throws InvalidReservationException
      Completes the 'update reservation' action.

      This method requests for additional input to decide which field to update.

      The method also performs the necessary checks to ensure that the new value with with which the field is to be updated is valid.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface ICommand<MenuView,InvalidReservationException>
      Returns:
      MenuView#PREVIOUS_MENU if the option to return is chosen, MenuView#CURRENT_MENU otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if the desired field of the Reservation instance cannot be updated with the new value
